text: William Bedford Sr. House is a historic home located at Evansville, Indiana. It was built in 1873, and is a two-story brick dwelling with English influences. It features projecting polygonal bays and a one-story, full width front porch on four piers. Note: This includes It was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1978. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Indiana Category:Houses completed in 1873 Category:Houses in Evansville, Indiana Category:National Register of Historic Places in Evansville, Indiana
title: William Bedford Sr. House
